name: Planticide
description:
What is the maximum capacity of a forest? Planticide allows you to place plant life and manipulate your environment to try and pack as much life as possible in a confined space- keep an eye on the condition of your plants, however, as improper soil, water or sun conditions will halt their growth or kill them. How far can you go?

Team Members:

Grant Hoover - Plant Programmer & UI Developer

Katie McCarthy - Cactus, Trees & Weather Artist

Seth Berrier - Plant Growth & Gameplay Programmer

Olivia Hornback - UI & Flower Artist

Lewis Ellis - 3D Designer
